tool_contract.description: Generate config for structural variants pipeline

schema_options.name: Minimum Length of Structural Variant (bp)
schema_options.description: A structural variant must involve at least this many basepairs to be output.

schema_options.name: Minimum Reads That Support Variant (Count)
schema_options.description: At least this number of reads must provide evidence for a structural variant to output it. Separate subreads from a ZMW count only once.

schema_options.name: Minimum Reads That Support Variant (Percent)
schema_options.description: At least this percent of reads that span a structural variant locus must provide evidence for a variant to output it. Separate subreads from a ZMW count only once for support and overall coverage.

tool_contract.name: pbsvtools.tasks.config
